00073 static int ddDoDumpBlif ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode *f, FILE *fp, st_table *visited, char **names));
00074 static int ddDoDumpDaVinci ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode *f, FILE *fp, st_table *visited, char **names, long mask));

00085 
00105 int
00106 Cudd_DumpBlif(
00107   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00108   int  n /* number of output nodes to be dumped */,
00109   DdNode ** f /* array of output nodes to be dumped */,
00110   char ** inames /* array of input names (or NULL) */,
00111   char ** onames /* array of output names (or NULL) */,
00112   char * mname /* model name (or NULL) */,
00113   FILE * fp /* pointer to the dump file */)
00114 {
00115     DdNode      *support = NULL;
00116     DdNode      *scan;
00117     int         *sorted = NULL;
00118     int         nvars = dd->size;
00119     st_table    *visited = NULL;
00120     int         retval;
00121     int         i;
00122 
00123     /* Build a bit array with the support of f. */
00124     sorted = ALLOC(int,nvars);
00125     if (sorted == NULL) {
00126         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00127         goto failure;
00128     }
00129     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) sorted[i] = 0;
00130 
00131     /* Take the union of the supports of each output function. */
00132     support = Cudd_VectorSupport(dd,f,n);
00133     if (support == NULL) goto failure;
00134     cuddRef(support);
00135     scan = support;
00136     while (!cuddIsConstant(scan)) {
00137         sorted[scan->index] = 1;
00138         scan = cuddT(scan);
00139     }
00140     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,support);
00141     support = NULL; /* so that we do not try to free it in case of failure */
00142 
00143     /* Write the header (.model .inputs .outputs). */
00144     if (mname == NULL) {
00145         retval = fprintf(fp,".model DD\n.inputs");
00146     } else {
00147         retval = fprintf(fp,".model %s\n.inputs",mname);
00148     }
00149     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00150 
00151     /* Write the input list by scanning the support array. */
00152     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
00153         if (sorted[i]) {
00154             if (inames == NULL) {
00155                 retval = fprintf(fp," %d", i);
00156             } else {
00157                 retval = fprintf(fp," %s", inames[i]);
00158             }
00159             if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00160         }
00161     }
00162     FREE(sorted);
00163     sorted = NULL;
00164 
00165     /* Write the .output line. */
00166     retval = fprintf(fp,"\n.outputs");
00167     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00168     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00169         if (onames == NULL) {
00170             retval = fprintf(fp," f%d", i);
00171         } else {
00172             retval = fprintf(fp," %s", onames[i]);
00173         }
00174         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00175     }
00176     retval = fprintf(fp,"\n");
00177     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00178 
00179     /* Initialize symbol table for visited nodes. */
00180     visited = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00181     if (visited == NULL) goto failure;
00182 
00183     /* Call the function that really gets the job done. */
00184     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00185         retval = ddDoDumpBlif(dd,Cudd_Regular(f[i]),fp,visited,inames);
00186         if (retval == 0) goto failure;
00187     }
00188 
00189     /* To account for the possible complement on the root,
00190     ** we put either a buffer or an inverter at the output of
00191     ** the multiplexer representing the top node.
00192     */
00193     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00194         if (onames == NULL) {
00195             retval = fprintf(fp,
00196 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00197                 ".names %lx f%d\n", (unsigned long) f[i] / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode), i);
00198 #else
00199                 ".names %x f%d\n", (unsigned) f[i] / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode), i);
00200 #endif
00201         } else {
00202             retval = fprintf(fp,
00203 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00204                 ".names %lx %s\n", (unsigned long) f[i] / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode), onames[i]);
00205 #else
00206                 ".names %x %s\n", (unsigned) f[i] / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode), onames[i]);
00207 #endif
00208         }
00209         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00210         if (Cudd_IsComplement(f[i])) {
00211             retval = fprintf(fp,"0 1\n");
00212         } else {
00213             retval = fprintf(fp,"1 1\n");
00214         }
00215         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00216     }
00217 
00218     /* Write trailer and return. */
00219     retval = fprintf(fp,".end\n");
00220     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00221 
00222     st_free_table(visited);
00223     return(1);
00224 
00225 failure:
00226     if (sorted != NULL) FREE(sorted);
00227     if (support != NULL) Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,support);
00228     if (visited != NULL) st_free_table(visited);
00229     return(0);
00230 
00231 } /* end of Cudd_DumpBlif */
00232 
00233 
00262 int
00263 Cudd_DumpDot(
00264   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00265   int  n /* number of output nodes to be dumped */,
00266   DdNode ** f /* array of output nodes to be dumped */,
00267   char ** inames /* array of input names (or NULL) */,
00268   char ** onames /* array of output names (or NULL) */,
00269   FILE * fp /* pointer to the dump file */)
00270 {
00271     DdNode      *support = NULL;
00272     DdNode      *scan;
00273     int         *sorted = NULL;
00274     int         nvars = dd->size;
00275     st_table    *visited = NULL;
00276     st_generator *gen = NULL;
00277     int         retval;
00278     int         i, j;
00279     int         slots;
00280 #ifdef __osf__
00281 #pragma pointer_size save
00282 #pragma pointer_size short
00283 #endif
00284     DdNode      **nodelist;
00285 #ifdef __osf__
00286 #pragma pointer_size restore
00287 #endif
00288     long        refAddr, diff, mask;
00289 
00290     /* Build a bit array with the support of f. */
00291     sorted = ALLOC(int,nvars);
00292     if (sorted == NULL) {
00293         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00294         goto failure;
00295     }
00296     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) sorted[i] = 0;
00297 
00298     /* Take the union of the supports of each output function. */
00299     support = Cudd_VectorSupport(dd,f,n);
00300     if (support == NULL) goto failure;
00301     cuddRef(support);
00302     scan = support;
00303     while (!cuddIsConstant(scan)) {
00304         sorted[scan->index] = 1;
00305         scan = cuddT(scan);
00306     }
00307     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,support);
00308     support = NULL; /* so that we do not try to free it in case of failure */
00309 
00310     /* Initialize symbol table for visited nodes. */
00311     visited = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00312     if (visited == NULL) goto failure;
00313 
00314     /* Collect all the nodes of this DD in the symbol table. */
00315     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00316         retval = cuddCollectNodes(Cudd_Regular(f[i]),visited);
00317         if (retval == 0) goto failure;
00318     }
00319 
00320     /* Find how many most significant hex digits are identical
00321     ** in the addresses of all the nodes. Build a mask based
00322     ** on this knowledge, so that digits that carry no information
00323     ** will not be printed. This is done in two steps.
00324     **  1. We scan the symbol table to find the bits that differ
00325     **     in at least 2 addresses.
00326     **  2. We choose one of the possible masks. There are 8 possible
00327     **     masks for 32-bit integer, and 16 possible masks for 64-bit
00328     **     integers.
00329     */
00330 
00331     /* Find the bits that are different. */
00332     refAddr = (long) Cudd_Regular(f[0]);
00333     diff = 0;
00334     gen = st_init_gen(visited);
00335     if (gen == NULL) goto failure;
00336     while (st_gen(gen, (char **) &scan, NULL)) {
00337         diff |= refAddr ^ (long) scan;
00338     }
00339     st_free_gen(gen); gen = NULL;
00340 
00341     /* Choose the mask. */
00342     for (i = 0; (unsigned) i < 8 * sizeof(long); i += 4) {
00343         mask = (1 << i) - 1;
00344         if (diff <= mask) break;
00345     }
00346 
00347     /* Write the header and the global attributes. */
00348     retval = fprintf(fp,"digraph \"DD\" {\n");
00349     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00350     retval = fprintf(fp,
00351         "size = \"7.5,10\"\ncenter = true;\nedge [dir = none];\n");
00352     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00353 
00354     /* Write the input name subgraph by scanning the support array. */
00355     retval = fprintf(fp,"{ node [shape = plaintext];\n");
00356     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00357     retval = fprintf(fp,"  edge [style = invis];\n");
00358     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00359     /* We use a name ("CONST NODES") with an embedded blank, because
00360     ** it is unlikely to appear as an input name.
00361     */
00362     retval = fprintf(fp,"  \"CONST NODES\" [style = invis];\n");
00363     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00364     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
00365         if (sorted[dd->invperm[i]]) {
00366             if (inames == NULL) {
00367                 retval = fprintf(fp,"\" %d \" -> ", dd->invperm[i]);
00368             } else {
00369                 retval = fprintf(fp,"\" %s \" -> ", inames[dd->invperm[i]]);
00370             }
00371             if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00372         }
00373     }
00374     retval = fprintf(fp,"\"CONST NODES\"; \n}\n");
00375     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00376 
00377     /* Write the output node subgraph. */
00378     retval = fprintf(fp,"{ rank = same; node [shape = box]; edge [style = invis];\n");
00379     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00380     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00381         if (onames == NULL) {
00382             retval = fprintf(fp,"\"F%d\"", i);
00383         } else {
00384             retval = fprintf(fp,"\"  %s  \"", onames[i]);
00385         }
00386         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00387         if (i == n - 1) {
00388             retval = fprintf(fp,"; }\n");
00389         } else {
00390             retval = fprintf(fp," -> ");
00391         }
00392         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00393     }
00394 
00395     /* Write rank info: All nodes with the same index have the same rank. */
00396     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
00397         if (sorted[dd->invperm[i]]) {
00398             retval = fprintf(fp,"{ rank = same; ");
00399             if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00400             if (inames == NULL) {
00401                 retval = fprintf(fp,"\" %d \";\n", dd->invperm[i]);
00402             } else {
00403                 retval = fprintf(fp,"\" %s \";\n", inames[dd->invperm[i]]);
00404             }
00405             if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00406             nodelist = dd->subtables[i].nodelist;
00407             slots = dd->subtables[i].slots;
00408             for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
00409                 scan = nodelist[j];
00410                 while (scan != NULL) {
00411                     if (st_is_member(visited,(char *) scan)) {
00412                         retval = fprintf(fp,"\"%lx\";\n", (mask & (long) scan) / sizeof(DdNode));
00413                         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00414                     }
00415                     scan = scan->next;
00416                 }
00417             }
00418             retval = fprintf(fp,"}\n");
00419             if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00420         }
00421     }
00422 
00423     /* All constants have the same rank. */
00424     retval = fprintf(fp,
00425         "{ rank = same; \"CONST NODES\";\n{ node [shape = box]; ");
00426     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00427     nodelist = dd->constants.nodelist;
00428     slots = dd->constants.slots;
00429     for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
00430         scan = nodelist[j];
00431         while (scan != NULL) {
00432             if (st_is_member(visited,(char *) scan)) {
00433                 retval = fprintf(fp,"\"%lx\";\n", (mask & (long) scan) / sizeof(DdNode));
00434                 if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00435             }
00436             scan = scan->next;
00437         }
00438     }
00439     retval = fprintf(fp,"}\n}\n");
00440     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00441 
00442     /* Write edge info. */
00443     /* Edges from the output nodes. */
00444     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00445         if (onames == NULL) {
00446             retval = fprintf(fp,"\"F%d\"", i);
00447         } else {
00448             retval = fprintf(fp,"\"  %s  \"", onames[i]);
00449         }
00450         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00451         /* Account for the possible complement on the root. */
00452         if (Cudd_IsComplement(f[i])) {
00453             retval = fprintf(fp," -> \"%lx\" [style = dotted];\n",
00454                 (mask & (long) f[i]) / sizeof(DdNode));
00455         } else {
00456             retval = fprintf(fp," -> \"%lx\" [style = solid];\n",
00457                 (mask & (long) f[i]) / sizeof(DdNode));
00458         }
00459         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00460     }
00461 
00462     /* Edges from internal nodes. */
00463     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
00464         if (sorted[dd->invperm[i]]) {
00465             nodelist = dd->subtables[i].nodelist;
00466             slots = dd->subtables[i].slots;
00467             for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
00468                 scan = nodelist[j];
00469                 while (scan != NULL) {
00470                     if (st_is_member(visited,(char *) scan)) {
00471                         retval = fprintf(fp,
00472                             "\"%lx\" -> \"%lx\";\n",
00473                             (mask & (long) scan) / sizeof(DdNode),
00474                             (mask & (long) cuddT(scan)) / sizeof(DdNode));
00475                         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00476                         if (Cudd_IsComplement(cuddE(scan))) {
00477                             retval = fprintf(fp,
00478                                 "\"%lx\" -> \"%lx\" [style = dotted];\n",
00479                                 (mask & (long) scan) / sizeof(DdNode),
00480                                 (mask & (long) cuddE(scan)) / sizeof(DdNode));
00481                         } else {
00482                             retval = fprintf(fp,
00483                                 "\"%lx\" -> \"%lx\" [style = dashed];\n",
00484                                 (mask & (long) scan) / sizeof(DdNode),
00485                                 (mask & (long) cuddE(scan)) / sizeof(DdNode));
00486                         }
00487                         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00488                     }
00489                     scan = scan->next;
00490                 }
00491             }
00492         }
00493     }
00494 
00495     /* Write constant labels. */
00496     nodelist = dd->constants.nodelist;
00497     slots = dd->constants.slots;
00498     for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
00499         scan = nodelist[j];
00500         while (scan != NULL) {
00501             if (st_is_member(visited,(char *) scan)) {
00502                 retval = fprintf(fp,"\"%lx\" [label = \"%g\"];\n",
00503                     (mask & (long) scan) / sizeof(DdNode), cuddV(scan));
00504                 if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00505             }
00506             scan = scan->next;
00507         }
00508     }
00509 
00510     /* Write trailer and return. */
00511     retval = fprintf(fp,"}\n");
00512     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00513 
00514     st_free_table(visited);
00515     FREE(sorted);
00516     return(1);
00517 
00518 failure:
00519     if (sorted != NULL) FREE(sorted);
00520     if (support != NULL) Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,support);
00521     if (visited != NULL) st_free_table(visited);
00522     return(0);
00523 
00524 } /* end of Cudd_DumpDot */

00526 
00544 int
00545 Cudd_DumpDaVinci(
00546   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00547   int  n /* number of output nodes to be dumped */,
00548   DdNode ** f /* array of output nodes to be dumped */,
00549   char ** inames /* array of input names (or NULL) */,
00550   char ** onames /* array of output names (or NULL) */,
00551   FILE * fp /* pointer to the dump file */)
00552 {
00553     DdNode      *support = NULL;
00554     DdNode      *scan;
00555     st_table    *visited = NULL;
00556     int         retval;
00557     int         i;
00558     st_generator *gen;
00559     long        refAddr, diff, mask;
00560 
00561     /* Initialize symbol table for visited nodes. */
00562     visited = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00563     if (visited == NULL) goto failure;
00564 
00565     /* Collect all the nodes of this DD in the symbol table. */
00566     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00567         retval = cuddCollectNodes(Cudd_Regular(f[i]),visited);
00568         if (retval == 0) goto failure;
00569     }
00570 
00571     /* Find how many most significant hex digits are identical
00572     ** in the addresses of all the nodes. Build a mask based
00573     ** on this knowledge, so that digits that carry no information
00574     ** will not be printed. This is done in two steps.
00575     **  1. We scan the symbol table to find the bits that differ
00576     **     in at least 2 addresses.
00577     **  2. We choose one of the possible masks. There are 8 possible
00578     **     masks for 32-bit integer, and 16 possible masks for 64-bit
00579     **     integers.
00580     */
00581 
00582     /* Find the bits that are different. */
00583     refAddr = (long) Cudd_Regular(f[0]);
00584     diff = 0;
00585     gen = st_init_gen(visited);
00586     while (st_gen(gen, (char **) &scan, NULL)) {
00587         diff |= refAddr ^ (long) scan;
00588     }
00589     st_free_gen(gen);
00590 
00591     /* Choose the mask. */
00592     for (i = 0; (unsigned) i < 8 * sizeof(long); i += 4) {
00593         mask = (1 << i) - 1;
00594         if (diff <= mask) break;
00595     }
00596     st_free_table(visited);
00597 
00598     /* Initialize symbol table for visited nodes. */
00599     visited = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00600     if (visited == NULL) goto failure;
00601 
00602     retval = fprintf(fp, "[");
00603     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00604     /* Call the function that really gets the job done. */
00605     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00606         if (onames == NULL) {
00607             retval = fprintf(fp,
00608                              "l(\"f%d\",n(\"root\",[a(\"OBJECT\",\"f%d\")],",
00609                              i,i);
00610         } else {
00611             retval = fprintf(fp,
00612                              "l(\"%s\",n(\"root\",[a(\"OBJECT\",\"%s\")],",
00613                              onames[i], onames[i]);
00614         }
00615         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00616         retval = fprintf(fp, "[e(\"edge\",[a(\"EDGECOLOR\",\"%s\"),a(\"_DIR\",\"none\")],",
00617                          Cudd_IsComplement(f[i]) ? "red" : "blue");
00618         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00619         retval = ddDoDumpDaVinci(dd,Cudd_Regular(f[i]),fp,visited,inames,mask);
00620         if (retval == 0) goto failure;
00621         retval = fprintf(fp, ")]))%s", i == n-1 ? "" : ",");
00622         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00623     }
00624 
00625     /* Write trailer and return. */
00626     retval = fprintf(fp, "]\n");
00627     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00628 
00629     st_free_table(visited);
00630     return(1);
00631 
00632 failure:
00633     if (support != NULL) Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,support);
00634     if (visited != NULL) st_free_table(visited);
00635     return(0);
00636 
00637 } /* end of Cudd_DumpDaVinci */
00638

00657 int
00658 Cudd_DumpDDcal(
00659   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00660   int  n /* number of output nodes to be dumped */,
00661   DdNode ** f /* array of output nodes to be dumped */,
00662   char ** inames /* array of input names (or NULL) */,
00663   char ** onames /* array of output names (or NULL) */,
00664   FILE * fp /* pointer to the dump file */)
00665 {
00666     DdNode      *support = NULL;
00667     DdNode      *scan;
00668     int         *sorted = NULL;
00669     int         nvars = dd->size;
00670     st_table    *visited = NULL;
00671     int         retval;
00672     int         i;
00673     st_generator *gen;
00674     long        refAddr, diff, mask;
00675 
00676     /* Initialize symbol table for visited nodes. */
00677     visited = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00678     if (visited == NULL) goto failure;
00679 
00680     /* Collect all the nodes of this DD in the symbol table. */
00681     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00682         retval = cuddCollectNodes(Cudd_Regular(f[i]),visited);
00683         if (retval == 0) goto failure;
00684     }
00685 
00686     /* Find how many most significant hex digits are identical
00687     ** in the addresses of all the nodes. Build a mask based
00688     ** on this knowledge, so that digits that carry no information
00689     ** will not be printed. This is done in two steps.
00690     **  1. We scan the symbol table to find the bits that differ
00691     **     in at least 2 addresses.
00692     **  2. We choose one of the possible masks. There are 8 possible
00693     **     masks for 32-bit integer, and 16 possible masks for 64-bit
00694     **     integers.
00695     */
00696 
00697     /* Find the bits that are different. */
00698     refAddr = (long) Cudd_Regular(f[0]);
00699     diff = 0;
00700     gen = st_init_gen(visited);
00701     while (st_gen(gen, (char **) &scan, NULL)) {
00702         diff |= refAddr ^ (long) scan;
00703     }
00704     st_free_gen(gen);
00705 
00706     /* Choose the mask. */
00707     for (i = 0; (unsigned) i < 8 * sizeof(long); i += 4) {
00708         mask = (1 << i) - 1;
00709         if (diff <= mask) break;
00710     }
00711     st_free_table(visited);
00712 
00713     /* Build a bit array with the support of f. */
00714     sorted = ALLOC(int,nvars);
00715     if (sorted == NULL) {
00716         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00717         goto failure;
00718     }
00719     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) sorted[i] = 0;
00720 
00721     /* Take the union of the supports of each output function. */
00722     support = Cudd_VectorSupport(dd,f,n);
00723     if (support == NULL) goto failure;
00724     cuddRef(support);
00725     scan = support;
00726     while (!cuddIsConstant(scan)) {
00727         sorted[scan->index] = 1;
00728         scan = cuddT(scan);
00729     }
00730     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,support);
00731     support = NULL; /* so that we do not try to free it in case of failure */
00732     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
00733         if (sorted[dd->invperm[i]]) {
00734             if (inames == NULL) {
00735                 retval = fprintf(fp,"v%d", dd->invperm[i]);
00736             } else {
00737                 retval = fprintf(fp,"%s", inames[dd->invperm[i]]);
00738             }
00739             if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00740         }
00741         retval = fprintf(fp,"%s", i == nvars - 1 ? "\n" : " * ");
00742         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00743     }
00744     FREE(sorted);
00745     sorted = NULL;
00746 
00747     /* Initialize symbol table for visited nodes. */
00748     visited = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00749     if (visited == NULL) goto failure;
00750 
00751     /* Call the function that really gets the job done. */
00752     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00753         retval = ddDoDumpDDcal(dd,Cudd_Regular(f[i]),fp,visited,inames,mask);
00754         if (retval == 0) goto failure;
00755         if (onames == NULL) {
00756             retval = fprintf(fp, "f%d = ", i);
00757         } else {
00758             retval = fprintf(fp, "%s = ", onames[i]);
00759         }
00760         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00761         retval = fprintf(fp, "n%lx%s\n",
00762                          ((long) f[i] & mask) / sizeof(DdNode),
00763                          Cudd_IsComplement(f[i]) ? "'" : "");
00764         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00765     }
00766 
00767     /* Write trailer and return. */
00768     retval = fprintf(fp, "[");
00769     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00770     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00771         if (onames == NULL) {
00772             retval = fprintf(fp, "f%d", i);
00773         } else {
00774             retval = fprintf(fp, "%s", onames[i]);
00775         }
00776         retval = fprintf(fp, "%s", i == n-1 ? "" : " ");
00777         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00778     }
00779     retval = fprintf(fp, "]\n");
00780     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00781 
00782     st_free_table(visited);
00783     return(1);
00784 
00785 failure:
00786     if (sorted != NULL) FREE(sorted);
00787     if (support != NULL) Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,support);
00788     if (visited != NULL) st_free_table(visited);
00789     return(0);
00790 
00791 } /* end of Cudd_DumpDDcal */
00792 
00793 
00814 int
00815 Cudd_DumpFactoredForm(
00816   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00817   int  n /* number of output nodes to be dumped */,
00818   DdNode ** f /* array of output nodes to be dumped */,
00819   char ** inames /* array of input names (or NULL) */,
00820   char ** onames /* array of output names (or NULL) */,
00821   FILE * fp /* pointer to the dump file */)
00822 {
00823     int         retval;
00824     int         i;
00825 
00826     /* Call the function that really gets the job done. */
00827     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00828         if (onames == NULL) {
00829             retval = fprintf(fp, "f%d = ", i);
00830         } else {
00831             retval = fprintf(fp, "%s = ", onames[i]);
00832         }
00833         if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00834         if (f[i] == DD_ONE(dd)) {
00835             retval = fprintf(fp, "CONST1");
00836             if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00837         } else if (f[i] == Cudd_Not(DD_ONE(dd)) || f[i] == DD_ZERO(dd)) {
00838             retval = fprintf(fp, "CONST0");
00839             if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00840         } else {
00841             retval = fprintf(fp, "%s", Cudd_IsComplement(f[i]) ? "!(" : "");
00842             if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00843             retval = ddDoDumpFactoredForm(dd,Cudd_Regular(f[i]),fp,inames);
00844             if (retval == 0) return(0);
00845             retval = fprintf(fp, "%s", Cudd_IsComplement(f[i]) ? ")" : "");
00846             if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00847         }
00848         retval = fprintf(fp, "%s", i == n-1 ? "" : "\n");
00849         if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00850     }
00851 
00852     return(1);
00853 
00854 } /* end of Cudd_DumpFactoredForm */
00855 
00856 
00857 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00858 /* Definition of internal functions                                          */
00859 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00860

00862 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00863 /* Definition of static functions                                            */
00864 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00865 
00866 
00881 static int
00882 ddDoDumpBlif(
00883   DdManager * dd,
00884   DdNode * f,
00885   FILE * fp,
00886   st_table * visited,
00887   char ** names)
00888 {
00889     DdNode      *T, *E;
00890     int         retval;
00891 
00892 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00893     assert(!Cudd_IsComplement(f));
00894 #endif
00895 
00896     /* If already visited, nothing to do. */
00897     if (st_is_member(visited, (char *) f) == 1)
00898         return(1);
00899 
00900     /* Check for abnormal condition that should never happen. */
00901     if (f == NULL)
00902         return(0);
00903 
00904     /* Mark node as visited. */
00905     if (st_insert(visited, (char *) f, NULL) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM)
00906         return(0);
00907 
00908     /* Check for special case: If constant node, generate constant 1. */
00909     if (f == DD_ONE(dd)) {
00910 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00911         retval = fprintf(fp, ".names %lx\n1\n",(unsigned long) f / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode));
00912 #else
00913         retval = fprintf(fp, ".names %x\n1\n",(unsigned) f / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode));
00914 #endif
00915         if (retval == EOF) {
00916             return(0);
00917         } else {
00918             return(1);
00919         }
00920     }
00921 
00922     /* Check whether this is an ADD. We deal with 0-1 ADDs, but not
00923     ** with the general case.
00924     */
00925     if (f == DD_ZERO(dd)) {
00926 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00927         retval = fprintf(fp, ".names %lx\n",(unsigned long) f / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode));
00928 #else
00929         retval = fprintf(fp, ".names %x\n",(unsigned) f / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode));
00930 #endif
00931         if (retval == EOF) {
00932             return(0);
00933         } else {
00934             return(1);
00935         }
00936     }
00937     if (cuddIsConstant(f))
00938         return(0);
00939 
00940     /* Recursive calls. */
00941     T = cuddT(f);
00942     retval = ddDoDumpBlif(dd,T,fp,visited,names);
00943     if (retval != 1) return(retval);
00944     E = Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f));
00945     retval = ddDoDumpBlif(dd,E,fp,visited,names);
00946     if (retval != 1) return(retval);
00947 
00948     /* Write multiplexer taking complement arc into account. */
00949     if (names != NULL) {
00950         retval = fprintf(fp,".names %s", names[f->index]);
00951     } else {
00952         retval = fprintf(fp,".names %d", f->index);
00953     }
00954     if (retval == EOF)
00955         return(0);
00956 
00957 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00958     if (Cudd_IsComplement(cuddE(f))) {
00959         retval = fprintf(fp," %lx %lx %lx\n11- 1\n0-0 1\n",
00960             (unsigned long) T / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode),
00961             (unsigned long) E / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode),
00962             (unsigned long) f / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode));
00963     } else {
00964         retval = fprintf(fp," %lx %lx %lx\n11- 1\n0-1 1\n",
00965             (unsigned long) T / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode),
00966             (unsigned long) E / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode),
00967             (unsigned long) f / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode));
00968     }
00969 #else
00970     if (Cudd_IsComplement(cuddE(f))) {
00971         retval = fprintf(fp," %x %x %x\n11- 1\n0-0 1\n",
00972             (unsigned) T / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode),
00973             (unsigned) E / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode),
00974             (unsigned) f / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode));
00975     } else {
00976         retval = fprintf(fp," %x %x %x\n11- 1\n0-1 1\n",
00977             (unsigned) T / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode),
00978             (unsigned) E / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode),
00979             (unsigned) f / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode));
00980     }
00981 #endif
00982     if (retval == EOF) {
00983         return(0);
00984     } else {
00985         return(1);
00986     }
00987 
00988 } /* end of ddDoDumpBlif */
00989 
00990 
01005 static int
01006 ddDoDumpDaVinci(
01007   DdManager * dd,
01008   DdNode * f,
01009   FILE * fp,
01010   st_table * visited,
01011   char ** names,
01012   long  mask)
01013 {
01014     DdNode      *T, *E;
01015     int         retval;
01016     long        id;
01017 
01018 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01019     assert(!Cudd_IsComplement(f));
01020 #endif
01021 
01022     id = ((long) f & mask) / sizeof(DdNode);
01023 
01024     /* If already visited, insert a reference. */
01025     if (st_is_member(visited, (char *) f) == 1) {
01026         retval = fprintf(fp,"r(\"%lx\")", id);
01027         if (retval == EOF) {
01028             return(0);
01029         } else {
01030             return(1);
01031         }
01032     }
01033 
01034     /* Check for abnormal condition that should never happen. */
01035     if (f == NULL)
01036         return(0);
01037 
01038     /* Mark node as visited. */
01039     if (st_insert(visited, (char *) f, NULL) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM)
01040         return(0);
01041 
01042     /* Check for special case: If constant node, generate constant 1. */
01043     if (Cudd_IsConstant(f)) {
01044         retval = fprintf(fp, "l(\"%lx\",n(\"constant\",[a(\"OBJECT\",\"%g\")],[]))", id, cuddV(f));
01045         if (retval == EOF) {
01046             return(0);
01047         } else {
01048             return(1);
01049         }
01050     }
01051 
01052     /* Recursive calls. */
01053     if (names != NULL) {
01054         retval = fprintf(fp,
01055                          "l(\"%lx\",n(\"internal\",[a(\"OBJECT\",\"%s\"),",
01056                          id, names[f->index]);
01057     } else {
01058         retval = fprintf(fp,
01059                          "l(\"%lx\",n(\"internal\",[a(\"OBJECT\",\"%d\"),",
01060                          id, f->index);
01061     }
01062     retval = fprintf(fp, "a(\"_GO\",\"ellipse\")],[e(\"then\",[a(\"EDGECOLOR\",\"blue\"),a(\"_DIR\",\"none\")],");
01063     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
01064     T = cuddT(f);
01065     retval = ddDoDumpDaVinci(dd,T,fp,visited,names,mask);
01066     if (retval != 1) return(retval);
01067     retval = fprintf(fp, "),e(\"else\",[a(\"EDGECOLOR\",\"%s\"),a(\"_DIR\",\"none\")],",
01068                      Cudd_IsComplement(cuddE(f)) ? "red" : "green");
01069     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
01070     E = Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f));
01071     retval = ddDoDumpDaVinci(dd,E,fp,visited,names,mask);
01072     if (retval != 1) return(retval);
01073 
01074     retval = fprintf(fp,")]))");
01075     if (retval == EOF) {
01076         return(0);
01077     } else {
01078         return(1);
01079     }
01080 
01081 } /* end of ddDoDumpDaVinci */
01082 
01083 
01098 static int
01099 ddDoDumpDDcal(
01100   DdManager * dd,
01101   DdNode * f,
01102   FILE * fp,
01103   st_table * visited,
01104   char ** names,
01105   long  mask)
01106 {
01107     DdNode      *T, *E;
01108     int         retval;
01109     long        id, idT, idE;
01110 
01111 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01112     assert(!Cudd_IsComplement(f));
01113 #endif
01114 
01115     id = ((long) f & mask) / sizeof(DdNode);
01116 
01117     /* If already visited, do nothing. */
01118     if (st_is_member(visited, (char *) f) == 1) {
01119         return(1);
01120     }
01121 
01122     /* Check for abnormal condition that should never happen. */
01123     if (f == NULL)
01124         return(0);
01125 
01126     /* Mark node as visited. */
01127     if (st_insert(visited, (char *) f, NULL) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM)
01128         return(0);
01129 
01130     /* Check for special case: If constant node, assign constant. */
01131     if (Cudd_IsConstant(f)) {
01132         if (f != DD_ONE(dd) && f != DD_ZERO(dd))
01133             return(0);
01134         retval = fprintf(fp, "n%lx = %g\n", id, cuddV(f));
01135         if (retval == EOF) {
01136             return(0);
01137         } else {
01138             return(1);
01139         }
01140     }
01141 
01142     /* Recursive calls. */
01143     T = cuddT(f);
01144     retval = ddDoDumpDDcal(dd,T,fp,visited,names,mask);
01145     if (retval != 1) return(retval);
01146     E = Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f));
01147     retval = ddDoDumpDDcal(dd,E,fp,visited,names,mask);
01148     if (retval != 1) return(retval);
01149     idT = ((long) T & mask) / sizeof(DdNode);
01150     idE = ((long) E & mask) / sizeof(DdNode);
01151     if (names != NULL) {
01152         retval = fprintf(fp, "n%lx = %s * n%lx + %s' * n%lx%s\n",
01153                          id, names[f->index], idT, names[f->index],
01154                          idE, Cudd_IsComplement(cuddE(f)) ? "'" : "");
01155     } else {
01156         retval = fprintf(fp, "n%lx = v%d * n%lx + v%d' * n%lx%s\n",
01157                          id, f->index, idT, f->index,
01158                          idE, Cudd_IsComplement(cuddE(f)) ? "'" : "");
01159     }
01160     if (retval == EOF) {
01161         return(0);
01162     } else {
01163         return(1);
01164     }
01165 
01166 } /* end of ddDoDumpDDcal */
01167 
01168 
01186 static int
01187 ddDoDumpFactoredForm(
01188   DdManager * dd,
01189   DdNode * f,
01190   FILE * fp,
01191   char ** names)
01192 {
01193     DdNode      *T, *E;
01194     int         retval;
01195 
01196 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01197     assert(!Cudd_IsComplement(f));
01198     assert(!Cudd_IsConstant(f));
01199 #endif
01200 
01201     /* Check for abnormal condition that should never happen. */
01202     if (f == NULL)
01203         return(0);
01204 
01205     /* Recursive calls. */
01206     T = cuddT(f);
01207     E = cuddE(f);
01208     if (T != DD_ZERO(dd)) {
01209         if (E != DD_ONE(dd)) {
01210             if (names != NULL) {
01211                 retval = fprintf(fp, "%s", names[f->index]);
01212             } else {
01213                 retval = fprintf(fp, "x%d", f->index);
01214             }
01215             if (retval == EOF) return(0);
01216         }
01217         if (T != DD_ONE(dd)) {
01218             retval = fprintf(fp, "%s(", E != DD_ONE(dd) ? " * " : "");
01219             if (retval == EOF) return(0);
01220             retval = ddDoDumpFactoredForm(dd,T,fp,names);
01221             if (retval != 1) return(retval);
01222             retval = fprintf(fp, ")");
01223             if (retval == EOF) return(0);
01224         }
01225         if (E == Cudd_Not(DD_ONE(dd)) || E == DD_ZERO(dd)) return(1);
01226         retval = fprintf(fp, " + ");
01227         if (retval == EOF) return(0);
01228     }
01229     E = Cudd_Regular(E);
01230     if (T != DD_ONE(dd)) {
01231         if (names != NULL) {
01232             retval = fprintf(fp, "!%s", names[f->index]);
01233         } else {
01234             retval = fprintf(fp, "!x%d", f->index);
01235         }
01236         if (retval == EOF) return(0);
01237     }
01238     if (E != DD_ONE(dd)) {
01239         retval = fprintf(fp, "%s%s(", T != DD_ONE(dd) ? " * " : "",
01240                          E != cuddE(f) ? "!" : "");
01241         if (retval == EOF) return(0);
01242         retval = ddDoDumpFactoredForm(dd,E,fp,names);
01243         if (retval != 1) return(retval);
01244         retval = fprintf(fp, ")");
01245         if (retval == EOF) return(0);
01246     }
01247     return(1);
01248 
01249 } /* end of ddDoDumpFactoredForm */
